observations.summary: Upgrade center-feed cards to Dexscreener-grade signals
observations.details: Enhance center-feed cards to display token image, price, multi-timeframe % changes, volume, liquidity, txns, holders, and expiry countdown without turning the app into a full charting tool.
Ensure trending is discovery only and market creation remains user-driven. If no market exists, show a 'Create Market' CTA instead of auto-creating.

observations.summary: Implement Birdeye API client with resilience patterns
observations.details: Create `src/priceAction/birdeye.ts` with request wrapper, retry/backoff, timeout, structured logging, and rate limit protection (concurrency + queue).

observations.summary: Implement Redis caching with specific TTLs
observations.details: Use Redis for caching Birdeye data (stats: 15s, candles: 30-60s, meta: 24h). Implement 'stale-while-revalidate' pattern to serve cached data immediately while refreshing in the background.

observations.summary: Create Token Stats Bundle API endpoint
observations.details: Implement `POST /v1/tokens/stats-bundle` to accept up to 50 mints and return all necessary data (price, volume, liquidity, changes, chart candles) in one request to prevent N+1 issues.
Implement `GET /v1/tokens/trending?limit=25` using Birdeye data, normalized to the TokenCardModel shape. Cache the whole response for 15-30s.
Create `market_volume_agg` table (Option A) with fields for total/24h volume and trade counts. Update via cron job every 1-5 minutes to avoid expensive on-the-fly calculations.
Update `GET /v1/price-action/feed` to include token mint, market state, expiry, strike/threshold, snapshot, and aggregated market volume fields.

Modify `src/components/glass/GlassPriceActionCard.tsx` to include a new header (token image/symbol), signal strip (price, % changes, vol, liq, txns, holders), chart area with overlays, and footer with NomNom volume.

observations.summary: Implement batch data fetching in feed view
observations.details: In `feed-view.tsx`, gather mints from the feed response and call `POST /v1/tokens/stats-bundle` once, passing the results into each card to ensure performance.
Add Timeframe selector (1H/6H/24H) and Sort options (Token Vol, NomNom Vol, Mover, Ending Soon, New) to the existing Filter UI.
Ensure charts use real candles or sufficiently-sampled lines. Downsample on backend if necessary (cap at ~120 points). Intervals: 1H (1-2m), 6H (5m), 24H (15m).

observations.summary: Add feature flag for Signal Cards
observations.details: Implement `FEATURE_SIGNAL_CARDS` environment variable to allow safe toggling of the new functionality in production.
